title: Alpha Client FeedBack
body: I think that the ranked queue for the alpha client is a bit too 2d and like a painting. I liked it better when there was wind blowing and it looked 3d but in the alpha client it doesn't have that.  Everything else is stunning and i really enjoying the alpha client.

replies.body: I liked to see downloading per second, if we could see that again it would be great! Riot is doing good and improving things always, thank you Riot!!

Agreed, 3d still looks way better. Even during champion select, while it's very aesthetically pleasing, a little more 3d elements would be fantastic. Making it too 2 dimensional gives the feel of playing a flash game on a browser and is a much less immersive experience.
Yeah that is what i'm going at
